actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Public Works, S. Rept. 93-1121.

actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: An original bill to authorize appropriations to the Secretary of Commerce for the promotion of tourist travel in the United States.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations up to $2,500,000 for each of the fiscal years 1975, 1976, and 1977 to the Secretary of Commerce for the promotion of tourist travel in the United States.

titles.title: An original bill to authorize appropriations to the Secretary of Commerce for the promotion of tourist travel in the United States.
